description.value:
Fear

Aura 5

Any enemy within the aura takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic, Weapon

Standard

+28 vs AC; (+29 against bloodied enemies)2d4+6 damage plus 2d6 necrotic damage (crit 5d6+14 +12 necrotic).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 15

+26 vs Will; 2d8+7 necrotic damage (crit 5d6 + 23 necrotic), and the target is immobilized (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Uganon makes either two pact blade or two ghoulish ray attacks

Encounter ✦ Necrotic, Zone

Standard

Area burst 5 within 20

Sustain Minor

Targets enemies; +24 vs Fortitude; 2d4+7 necrotic damage. Enemies treat the area as lightly obscured. A creature that enters or starts its turn within the zone is attacked. As a move action, Uganon can move the zone 3 squares. Sustain Minor: The zone persists.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Minor

Targets closest enemy

The curse remains in effect until either the target or Uganon is destroyed. Once per round, Uganon can deal an extra 4d6 necrotic damage to a cursed target he hits with an attack. Cursed targets that make an attack against Uganon take 5 necrotic damage.

Encounter

Minor

Uganon gains a +1 power bonus to his next attack roll against an enemy that hit him since his last turn. If the attack hits and deals damage, Uganon deals an extra 7 damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic, Teleportation

Minor

Uganon teleports 8 squares and becomes insubstantial until the end of his next turn. He can teleport into a space occupied by an ally or a cursed target, switching places with that target. A cursed enemy takes 10 necrotic damage from this switch.

Resist 15 fire, 10 necrotic 		Init +14 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 33Fort 33Ref 35Will 35
Speed 6
Ability ScoresStr 17 (+13)

Cha 24 (+17)
Languages Abyssal, Common
Alignment Chaotic evil
Skills Arcana +22, Bluff +22, Religion +22, Stealth +19Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 23

Equipment magic armor +4 feyleather armor , pact blade +4 , potion of recovery x2.
